name: Skin So Soft Original Gelled Body Oil

comments.creator: Avon Rep. Valerie Hansen/Vajaha Enterprises, LLC.
comments.content: SKIN SO SOFT Original - softens and conditions skin with Jojoba Oil. Experience crisp botanicals and fresh herbals. Absorbs instantly into skin and dries to a silky, powdery finish. Provides instant and lasting hydration with no sticky or greasy after-feel. 24-hour moisturization. #avon_valerie vnesnah.avonrepre...
comments.content_src: SKIN SO SOFT Original - softens and conditions skin with Jojoba Oil. Experience crisp botanicals and fresh herbals. Absorbs instantly into skin and dries to a silky, powdery finish.
